text: Added ROUGE metric to our Score API. Unlike BLEU (= precision), ROUGE measures recall. Should be useful to detect omissions, a common problem among NMT systems. #translation #evaluation #metrics https:// github.com/intento/intent o-api/blob/master/score.md ‚Ä¶

Another NMT service available via Intento middleware: Naver. Twenty language pairs: from Korean to English, Chinese (CN and TW), Spanish, French, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian and back, plus English <> Japanese and English <> French. https:// developers.naver.com/docs/nmt/refer ence/ ‚Ä¶

Google AutoML Translate quietly reduced minimum training data requirements to 1,000 segments, but our API Maintenance robots notice everything! Also, the upper bound of 100K was introduced, which may lead to a fixed training price. https:// cloud.google.com/translate/auto ml/docs/prepare ‚Ä¶
New annual AI Index Report by OpenAI is out! https:// aiindex.org

Globalese boosted their data augmentation with more stock corpora, make sure to evaluate how well it works for you. http://www. globalese-mt.com/2018/12/06/usi ng-stock-corpora-for-training-engines/ ‚Ä¶ #translation
By the way, old Yandex Translate API is scheduled to go offline on January 1st, make sure you have it in your roadmaps!

Two new Machine Translation systems available via Intento: http:// Yandex.Cloud (the same good Yandex Translate, but ~2 times cheaper) and Kakao MT. https:// inten.to/api-platform/a i/text/translate ‚Ä¶

More connectors! We just published Intento plugin for Matecat, an open-source CAT tool. Currently, it's in our fork here http:// bit.ly/intento_matecat . Hopefully, our pull-request will got accepted soon! #translation #API #plugins #Matecat

Nice! We‚Äôd be excited to see what automatic metrics show, and welcome everybody who wants to do a linguistic #quality evaluation to try out our new solution for holistic segment-level #MachineTranslation assessments

Another Christmas present for MT folk - DeepL just added support for Portuguese and Russian. https://www. deepl.com/en/blog/201812 05.html ‚Ä¶ As usual, you may use Intento tools to quickly compare its quality to Amazon, Google, or Yandex engines. #translation #russian #portuguese #deepl

Microsoft Custom Translator free till 2/1/2019, pricing updates: translation x4 up to $40/1M, model training capped by $300, and volume discounts for custom and stock are separated. Surprising! #translation #microsoft https://www. microsoft.com/en-us/translat or/business/customization/ ‚Ä¶
Based on some quick testing the #trados plugin doesn't work @HelloIntento @slatornews https:// twitter.com/paulfilkin/sta tus/1069874391863959553 ‚Ä¶
*Press Release* @HelloIntento Publishes Plugins for MemoQ and SDL Trados http:// bit.ly/SlatorPRIntent oMemoQSDLPlugins ‚Ä¶

Published Intento plugins for MemoQ ( https:// bit.ly/intento_memoq ) and SDL Trados ( https:// bit.ly/intento_trados ). Access to all 20+ Machine Translation systems available via our API middleware, with custom models where appropriate. Send all your hugs and bugs to hello@inten.to.

*Press Release* @HelloIntento has evaluated six domain-adaptive Neural Machine Translation systems for English-to-German translation (Medical domain) and published the report http:// bit.ly/SlatorPRIntent oNMT ‚Ä¶
Amazon Translate adds 8 new languages, now 417 language pairs https:// aws.amazon.com/about-aws/what s-new/2018/11/amazon-translate-adds-eight-new-languages/ ‚Ä¶

Domain-adaptive Neural Machine Translation. How good is it? How much does it cost? How long does it train? How much data do you need? How safe is your data? How to use it? Read in our new report! https:// bit.ly/custom_nmt_nov 2018 ‚Ä¶ #translation #mt #ai #evaluation pic.twitter.com/wRqNhWRv5Y

BREAKING: @content_quo announces new features for #MachineTranslation quality assessment at #tekom2018 #tekom ! (with help from @HelloIntento ) Read our @slatornews press release: https:// slator.com/press-releases /contentquo-announces-solution-for-manual-evaluation-of-mt-quality/ ‚Ä¶

New AI Survey from Deloitte: - 83% of AI users see >30% ROI - Professional Services and Media/Entertainment seeing the highest yield - Only 15% prefer on-premise - 49% prefer Cloud - AIaaS market grows 48.2% per year https:// www2.deloitte.com/insights/us/en /focus/cognitive-technologies/state-of-ai-and-intelligent-automation-in-business-survey.html ‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/9f6ralL2Ar
ouch, should be no new languages""

Wait until our next stock MT Evaluation Report to see! https:// aws.amazon.com/blogs/machine- learning/amazon-translate-now-offers-113-new-language-pairs/ ‚Ä¶ #translation #ai #api #amazon

API is natural for AI services, but humans need their interfaces too. We have launched a preview of our Web Tools for Machine Translation to help humans use AI ahead or instead of the integration https:// blog.inten.to/when-api-is-no t-enough-a67799488c48 ‚Ä¶ #ai #api #interfaces #translation

Everyone should know which BLEU they use (or TER, RIBES, LEPOR, etc.) All those are available via Intento Score API and here's how to use it. https:// blog.inten.to/which-bleu-is- the-bleu-4dc514527161 ‚Ä¶ #translation #evaluation #bleu #sacrebleu

Added ModernMT integration, so you could add it to your MT vendor portfolio. Just be careful, it's quite expensive and uses your data to improve the models. https:// inten.to/api-platform/a pi/modernmt ‚Ä¶

Google AutoML Translate launched! Already integrated into out API Platform, alongside IBM Custom NMT and Microsoft Custom Translate, so that you could pick the right one(s) for your projects. #automl #nmt #translation https://www. blog.google/products/googl e-cloud/empowering-businesses-and-developers-to-do-more-with-ai/ ‚Ä¶

Amazon Translate added 6 more languages, including Russian and Turkish (hard nuts to crack!). Can't wait until we evaluated the performance. Stay tuned! #translation #ai #api https:// aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/amaz on-translate-adds-support-for-new-languages/ ‚Ä¶

Don't like to tinker with HTTP requests from your app? Understandable so! Here comes our first #SDK - for #NodeJS . Need SDK for another language? Let us know! https://www. npmjs.com/package/intent o-nodejs ‚Ä¶

We have launched a #developer console ( https:// console.inten.to ). Not much there yet, but you can register at and get a sandbox key. Feel how convenient it is to have access every #AI vendor via the same #API !
